name: NutDealer (Chris)
description: A funny fan-game I made for a school assignment. The game's based on the indie game hit Undertale by Toby Fox. I only decided to upload it here for ease of access for my friends and nothing more. Also I uh, wish to not get sued 😅 and I apologies for all non-credited and non-licensed assets I've used. Contact me if there's any problems of any kind.
